quadrants.title: Tools
quadrants.description: A range of software tools, from simple productivity enhancers to comprehensive project solutions, catering to various project needs.

quadrants.title: Platforms & Operations
quadrants.description: Technologies and tools for software and infrastructure operations, including platforms and services for managing and scaling applications.

quadrants.title: Languages & Frameworks
quadrants.description: A selection of programming languages, alongside essential frameworks for building a variety of custom software.

rings.title: Adopt
rings.description: The technology has proven its value and reliability, making it recommended for wider adoption within the organization or industry.

rings.title: Trial
rings.description: The technology has shown enough potential to be implemented in a limited capacity. This phase involves testing in controlled environments or specific use cases.

rings.title: Assess
rings.description: In this phase, we identify and evaluate new technologies or techniques.

rings.title: Hold
rings.description: The technology should not be used in new projects. Current projects may be migrated to a more suitable technology.
